Key Match Events: Bradley Beal scored 25 points off the bench
Devin Booker added 20 points and 12 assists
Beal made a driving layup just before the third quarter buzzer to give the Suns a 98-92 lead heading into the fourth
Grayson Allen hit his fifth 3-pointer to give the Suns a 120-105 lead with 3:26 left
Atlanta scored the next 10 points but Allen sealed it with a tough layup in traffic with 36 seconds left
Others: The Suns took a 38-31 lead in the first quarter after shooting 75% from the field
The Hawks rallied with their own hot-shooting quarter to take a 72-68 advantage by halftime
Trae Young led the Hawks with 21 points and seven assists. Seven Atlanta players scored in double figures
The Suns have won two of their past three as they try to shake a slump that's lasted nearly two months
Phoenix has a lot of work to do, but now that their Big 3 are healthy, they have a chance to gain some momentum
The Hawks fall back to.500 for the season after struggling to stop the Suns' offense
The Hawks missed forward Jalen Johnson, who missed a third straight game with right shoulder inflammation
